# archestra_prompt (Resource)

Manages an Archestra prompt. Prompts can be created, updated, and deleted. Updates create new versions of the prompt.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "archestra_prompt" "example" {
  profile_id    = "profile-id-here"
  name          = "my-prompt"
  prompt        = "This is the main user prompt content"
  system_prompt = "This is the system prompt"
  is_active     = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the prompt
- `profile_id` (String) The Profile ID for the prompt
- `prompt` (String) The main prompt content

### Optional

- `is_active` (Boolean) Whether the prompt is active
- `system_prompt` (String) System prompt content

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Prompt identifier
- `version` (Number) Version of the prompt
